The food was terrible!  I was in during a Friday morning with a date and the place was virtually empty.  The waiter was incredibly rude and did not attempt to engage in English or Spanish, of which I speak both.  You can't order off the brunch menu except on the weekend so we had to order something from the case.  The Spanish quiche was terrible.  It was lukewarm and cold in spots and was not heated evenly or thoroughly.  But, hey, if you like day old lukewarm quiche reconstituted in what would appear to be a microwave, this is your go to place.  Oh, and did I mention it's going to make you sick
